name: RollOut (itch)
description:
A combination of breakout and dice rolling made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

When the ball hits your paddle, a dice is rolled and the active ability of one of your powerups is activated. Every time you level up, you can choose a new powerup and slot it into one of your six slots, corresponding to your dice rolls.

Synthetic by | e s c p | https://escp-music.bandcamp.com/
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com/
